/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a vibrant contrast to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. People can be seen walking on the sidewalks, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, indicating a well-organized traffic system. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
